short_summary: Purchase and delivery of a new surface grinder for the removal of an existing one
description: The Quality Engineering Test Establishment (QETE) provides technical advice and consultation, material evaluation, investigation and analysis, calibration and measurement, in the domains of mechanical and materials engineering, applied science, electrical engineering, measurement science and imagery. The purpose of this Request for Proposal (RFP) is for the removal and disposal of an existing NICCO surface grinder and the purchase, delivery, installation and training of a new surface grinder.

**Tender Description**

The existing NICCO surface grinder is to be removed and disposed of. The Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) requires a new surface grinder to be purchased, delivered, installed, and trained on. The equipment must meet the technical requirements specified in the attached request for proposal documents. The goods must be consigned and delivered to the Quality Engineering Test Establishment (QETE) Supply Warehouse in Gatineau, Quebec.
